text:
docs/appendix e.pdf is encoded with BinHex 4.0 (i.e. the .hqx format on Mac), 
and must be unencoded before use.

creator: jakarta@ehatchersolutions.com
text:
This has been corrected in the latest CVS version.  Please let us know if you
still experience problems with that version.
